name: AVCaptionRubyAlignment
desc: Constants that indicate ruby text alignments.

items.name: case start
items.desc: An alignment with the ruby base and text at the left edge of horizontal text in a left-to-right inline progression, or at top of the vertical text in a top-to-bottom inline progression.

items.name: case center
items.desc: An alignment with the ruby text at the center of ruby base.

items.name: case distributeSpaceBetween
items.desc: An alignment with the ruby text so the spaces between the ruby text characters are equal.

items.name: case distributeSpaceAround
items.desc: An alignment with the ruby text so the spaces around each ruby text character are equal.
